channel.title: Asides on Deuts Log
channel.description: Recent content in Asides on Deuts Log

item.title: BookLore - eBook Manager
item.description:
BookLore - eBook Manager

BookLore is a web app for hosting and managing books on a home server. It allows users to view PDFs, eBooks, and track reading progress. With features like metadata management and reading stats, BookLore provides an easy way to organize and explore your personal library.
Another eBook management app, alternatives to Kavita and Calibre-Web.
item.content:encoded:
BookLore - eBook Manager

BookLore is a web app for hosting and managing books on a home server. It allows users to view PDFs, eBooks, and track reading progress. With features like metadata management and reading stats, BookLore provides an easy way to organize and explore your personal library.
Another eBook management app, alternatives to Kavita and Calibre-Web.

item.title: MkDocs Charts Plugin
item.description:
MkDocs Charts Plugin

Mkdocs plugin to include charts in your site.
Another one of those great MkDocs plugin we need to check out and install.
item.content:encoded:
MkDocs Charts Plugin

Mkdocs plugin to include charts in your site.
Another one of those great MkDocs plugin we need to check out and install.

item.title: MkDocs Table Reader Plugin
item.description:
MkDocs Table Reader Plugin

MkDocs plugin to directly insert tables from files into markdown.
This is the power of MkDocs being backed by Python. There are so many plugins to choose from.
item.content:encoded:
MkDocs Table Reader Plugin

MkDocs plugin to directly insert tables from files into markdown.
This is the power of MkDocs being backed by Python. There are so many plugins to choose from.

item.title: @deuts@deuts.one 01JP2T89K3VT01SMD7CBK7FE6M
item.description:
Read this list Go’s and No Go’s in real estate developments in the Philippines, for my future reference:

Go’s:

  • Alveo Land is good being Ayala’s upscale
  • Avida is also okay being Ayala’s mid. Nuvali is a great community centered development.
  • DMCI, good design and consistent in terms of quality. I’ve been to several of their developments and they’re one of the most decent ones.
  • Filinvest is somewhat on Avida’s level.

No Go’s:

  • SMDC. Well, cockroach farm. Imagine that scene from Snowpiercer.
  • Empire East developments. Imagine Avida but wayy worse in quality.
  • Vista Land developments, anything by Villar. Dont even think about it.
  • Megaworld. Lack of maintenance, issues of substandard materials, flooding, falling ceilings, etc.

www.reddit.com/∞
item.content:encoded:
Read this list Go’s and No Go’s in real estate developments in the Philippines, for my future reference:

Go’s:

  • Alveo Land is good being Ayala’s upscale
  • Avida is also okay being Ayala’s mid. Nuvali is a great community centered development.
  • DMCI, good design and consistent in terms of quality. I’ve been to several of their developments and they’re one of the most decent ones.
  • Filinvest is somewhat on Avida’s level.

No Go’s:

  • SMDC. Well, cockroach farm. Imagine that scene from Snowpiercer.
  • Empire East developments. Imagine Avida but wayy worse in quality.
  • Vista Land developments, anything by Villar. Dont even think about it.
  • Megaworld. Lack of maintenance, issues of substandard materials, flooding, falling ceilings, etc.

www.reddit.com/∞

#RealEstatePH

item.title: @deuts@deuts.one 01JP236E2BERF899XCZEEZAC1J
item.description:
The new #BDO online banking platform at www.onlinebanking.bdo.com.ph/∞ has no Trust accounts view for my UITF/Investments accounts, so I’m stuck with the old website at online.bdo.com.ph/∞

Great! And the old site is full of bugs I was redirected to the login page after successful login. And not this:

You have been redirected to the log in page due to multiple sessions detected. Please close and reopen your browser and log in again. Thank you.
item.content:encoded:
The new #BDO online banking platform at www.onlinebanking.bdo.com.ph/∞ has no Trust accounts view for my UITF/Investments accounts, so I’m stuck with the old website at online.bdo.com.ph/∞

Great! And the old site is full of bugs I was redirected to the login page after successful login. And not this:

You have been redirected to the log in page due to multiple sessions detected. Please close and reopen your browser and log in again. Thank you.

Indeed, BDO finds ways!

item.title: Recommendarr - recommends movies and tv shows
item.description:
Recommendarr - recommends movies and tv shows

An AI driven recommendation system based on Radarr and Sonarr library information
Gotta implement try this out later. My wish is for it to be integrated into a Plex collection, so I can easily browse through the Plex interface.
item.content:encoded:
Recommendarr - recommends movies and tv shows

An AI driven recommendation system based on Radarr and Sonarr library information
Gotta implement try this out later. My wish is for it to be integrated into a Plex collection, so I can easily browse through the Plex interface.

item.title: Write SQL Queries in...Obsidian?
item.description:
Write SQL Queries in...Obsidian?

Did you know you can write queries to join data across all your data sources from within Obsidian.md?I
This one is interesting. I didn’t even know you can run Python scripts in Obsidian?! Now it’s a whole new world for me.
item.content:encoded:
Write SQL Queries in...Obsidian?

Did you know you can write queries to join data across all your data sources from within Obsidian.md?I
This one is interesting. I didn’t even know you can run Python scripts in Obsidian?! Now it’s a whole new world for me.

item.title: Docker | Quadratic Docs
item.description:
Docker | Quadratic Docs

Deploy Quadratic with Docker to almost any hardware.
This could be a great way to test my coding skills.
